mapper.select: select max(mainId) as max_Id from cqwu_scheduleMethod
mapper.insert: insert into cqwu_scheduleMethod( mainId, teacherClassId, studyTimeType, startWeek, endWeek, assignCode, teachPlaceType, capacity, isValid, isDeleted, dataRights ) values ( #{mainId}, #{teacherClassId}, #{studyTimeType}, #{startWeek}, #{endWeek}, #{assignCode}, #{teachPlaceType}, #{capacity}, #{isValid}, #{isDeleted}, #{dataRights} )
